creator: matthew_pocock@yahoo.co.uk
text:
I've tried to use nested <src> elements with javac - I have to compile sources
from multiple directories (don't ask). However, javac is requireing me to
include a srcdir attribute. The documentation states that you supply one or the
other.

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
The following works fine for me:
<javac destdir="classes">
   <src path="src"/>
</javac>
